descripcion_editar_docs: You can create and edit documents by using the text editor, applying the desired formatting, and attaching images by dragging and dropping them from your folder to where you see the cursor. In addition, you can change the title and assign tags that represent the content of the document
descripcion_metricas: Metrics measure the contribution that people have made on the platform, and allow you to know the level of knowledge the organization has, thanks to the tags assigned to each document.
descripcion_puntos_metricas: Points are accumulated according to different actions: Participating in the documents development (400 points), Reviewing and approving documents (200 points), Commenting on a document (100 points)
